participant_1.background:
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.
i lay awake at night so i can watch the stars.

participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love to cuddle with my dog and watch movies.
That sounds so relaxing! I love dogs. I have a cat.
Cats are great, too! I've been wanting to learn how to make my own clothes.
That's a cool hobby! I like to look for interesting things to add to my collection.
What kind of things do you collect?
I collect all kinds of things, but mostly books and records.
Oh, cool! I like to read, too. I like to go for runs on rainy days to clear my head.
I love running, too! But I usually run in the morning.
I like running in the morning, too, but sometimes I get lazy.
I know what you mean. Sometimes I have to force myself to get out the door.
Me too! But it's always worth it when I'm done.
I agree! Running is a great way to start the day.
It is! And it's a great way to relieve stress.
It is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think we could be friends.
